thread.title: Great place to explore the city
thread.title_full: Great place to explore the city - Review of Novotel London West, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Elizaveta G
title: Great place to explore the city
text:
That was my second visit ti the hotel and I have to admit that the hotel probably need a little bit renovation but the rooms, the breakfast, the service â€“ everything were absolutely great!
I slept like a child. It was very nice to have water, tea and coffee in the room.
The location is superb and mega convenient for those who plan to explore the city.
Surrounding area is very authentic and everything is found within a walking distance - malls, shops, pubs, restaurants, parcs.
I would also like to express my hearty thanks to Mrs Imke Rohde, Guest Relations Manager.
She was very helpful, attentive and perfoms her duty on a distinct level of professionalism!
Many thanks to her and to all team of Novotel London West!
